++ Responsibility Architecture

The RA is a LowerLevel [Architecture] for [Responsibilities].
    * Responsibilities can be intensive [Tasks] and should ideally occur OnlyOnce.

++Architecture
Responsibilities are [Tasks] that needs to be completed. Applications specify what responsibilities exist and when they are applicable. The RA will execute them with these parameters efficiently. This is [Componentry] for common tasks and aims to stop IrrelevantCoding.
